title: Levkovich on U.S. growth and debt concerns.
summary: As co-host on CNBC's Squawk Box today, Citi's Chief U.S. Equity Strategist Tobias Levokovich was among those looking at the impact of a debt ceiling deal, slow growth and unemployment on markets.
tag-1: Levkovich on U.S. growth and debt concerns.
tag-2: As co-host on CNBC's Squawk Box today, Citi's Chief U.S. Equity Strategist Tobias Levokovich was among those looking at the impact of a debt ceiling deal, slow growth and unemployment on markets.
